warband.name: Bensengan
warband.description: The drakeling Bensengan leads an aerial warband over the eastern fields of the Entwash Vale.

warband.name: Bughrakh
warband.description: An orc commander who leads a patrol on foot, typically in the woods east of Floodwend.

warband.name: Cinder
warband.description: A huge Salamander with two allies (Minions) - Typically found near Venomtongue in the Seething Mire west of Harwick.

warband.name: Craban-master Gundul
warband.description: Gundul and his sizable flock of crebain can be found wandering the ravaged crofts southeast of Garsfeld.

warband.name: Dahámab
warband.description: The leader of a mounted Uruk patrol southwest of Cliving.

warband.name: Dâl
warband.description: The mighty Dâl leads a band of mounted uruks across the hillside east of Eaworth.

warband.name: Fearrhorn
warband.description: A massive auroch, Fearrhorn and his herd can often be found grazing in the eastern fields of the Entash Vale.

warband.name: Haglob
warband.description: A mighty troll often found northwest of Elthengels, near the border with the Wold. He is his own warband.

warband.name: Hanrun
warband.description: A large, saddled warg notably missing his rider, escorted by two smaller wargs, who roves south of Feldburg.

warband.name: Kramp
warband.description: Kramp's band of warg-riders rove through the central fields of the Sutcrofts, often coming dangerously close to Snowborn.

warband.name: Mirz
warband.description: The half-orc Mirz heads a band of dunlendings, goblins, and orcs in the fields southeast of Thornhope.

warband.name: Mâthum
warband.description: Mâthum and his warg-riders patrol the fields north of Eaworth.

warband.name: Skútog
warband.description: Skútog and his warg-riders have been spotted patrolling the river crossing near Caddabrand's Camp.

warband.name: Swertríper
warband.description: A massive láthbear who roams the woods south of Elthengels, along with a pair of smaller láthbears.

warband.name: Urgai
warband.description: Urgai, Black Uruk of Mordor, leads a band in the hills southeast of Eaworth.

warband.name: Urush
warband.description: A mounted Easterling, leading a band of other Easterling riders through the hills west of Jóshkhin Orda.

warband.name: Warmaster Bugud
warband.description: Warmaster Bugud oversees a powerful warband in the eastern fields of the Sutcrofts, south of Hytbold.
